content: starts right before the left ear s2-3 slip_stitch ch7 6 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s4-6 slip_stitch chain 6 5 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s7 slip_stitch chain 11 10 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s8-9 slip_stitch chain 6 5 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s10 slip_stitch chain 7 6 half_double_crochet slip_stitch start to work in row r7 27 single_crochet chain 1 turn 27 r8-14 26 single_crochet chain 1 turn 26 r15 11 single_crochet decrease x2 ch1 turn 24 r16 24 single_crochet chain 1 turn r17 10sc decrease x 2 ch1 turn 22 r18 9sc decrease x2 chain 1 turn 20 slip_stitch fo weave in the ends arrange the strands as seen in the pictures i used liquid glue to glue them in place assembly 1- eyes between r 34-35 9 stitches apart 2- embroider eye brows above eyes 3- hair wig position with the ears 4- embroider star trek emblem on shirt happy crocheting
